lines.text: A bad sign - a bird in the house. Means somebody's died.

[Angry]
Enough of your witchcraft talk, Brother Arch. Only gives the Devil bad ideas.
It ain't how they bring yuh in or carry yuh out that matters. It's what yuh do while you're here they'll remember yuh by.

[to Johnny Dorette]
What do you see out there. Johnny? Yesterday or tomorrow?

[Rejecting Arch's advances]
When I wanna meet someone for the second time, I let'm know.
I've seen caves home in Kentucky like this. They make for nice tombs.
